Ticket Number: 00434830
Ticket Subject: CAP policy is not applying to Outlook webmail (Windows)
Ticket Details: Hi Team,

I'm creating current ticket on behalf of Directi team that reported that the CAP policy is not applying for email subject and email body although under Content Aware Protection > Deep Packet Inspection:
Monitor webmail - is turned ON
Outlook is selected from the "Select Parser:" dropdown
DPI is enabled for the Windows computer where tests were performed

EPP Server version: 5.9.4.1.
EPP client version: 6.2.4.2000

Please let us know if other details would be required here.

Thank you,
